## Bio

I'm a professor at the Universidade Federal do Espírito Santo (UFES), Brazil. My work centers on artificial intelligence (neural networks), robotics (perception, sensor fusion, localization, and mapping), programming and software design.

I have advised many talented [students](pages/supervision.qmd) at different levels, participated in research and innovation [projects](pages/projects.qmd) that led to peer-reviewed [publications](pages/publications.qmd) (47+ papers and 2441+ citations), while teaching a range of [courses](pages/teaching.qmd) in computing.

## Education

**Ph.D. in Computer Science.**  2015 - 2019. Universidade Federal do Espírito Santo. Supervisor: Alberto F. De Souza.

**Doctoral Rearch Visit to the Swiss AI Lab IDSIA.** 06/2017 - 07/2018. Supervisor: [Juergen Schmidhuber](http://people.idsia.ch/~juergen/).

**M.Sc. in Computer Science.**  2012 - 2014. Universidade Federal do Espírito Santo. Supervisor: Alberto F. De Souza.

**B.Sc. in Computer Science.**  2007 - 2012. Universidade Federal do Espírito Santo. Supervisor: Elias S. de Oliveira.
